title: cannot enter a game
body: i've been trying to fix this error, which consists in not allowing me to join any game i tried to start, it eventually stopped to "league of legends" and then told me there is an error, i proceeded to solve it, by uninstalling league, repatching, repairing and other stuff, nothing worked, anyone knows a solution?

replies.body: As *Valzuuuh* mentioned, more details of the specific error and where this is happening in the client would be really helpful. I'll be able to help better with that information. ^.^

Hey Gellino,

Have you tried disabling your antivirus software and firewall?

Screenshot of your error would be nice :)
